Package view

Class SuggestionMenu

java.lang.Object
view.SuggestionMenu
public class SuggestionMenu
extends java.lang.Object
Class to process GUI events related to Suggestions and Refutations

  • Method Details

    • makeSuggestion

      public java.lang.String makeSuggestion​(java.lang.String[] characters, java.lang.String[] weapons, java.lang.String[] rooms, RoomCard suggestionRoom)
      Let the current player make a suggestion
      Parameters:
      characters - characters string array
      weapons - weapons string array
      rooms - rooms string array
      suggestionRoom - room the player is located in (player must be in room to make a suggestion)
      Returns:
      selection

    • makeRefutation

      public java.lang.String makeRefutation​(Player refutePlayer, Player currentPlayer, Scenario suggestion)
      Let another player try to refute the suggestion made by the current player
      Parameters:
      refutePlayer - player making refutation
      currentPlayer - current player
      suggestion - suggestion scenario
      Returns:
      -1 if passed or the refutation string if pressing okay

    • unableToSuggest

      public void unableToSuggest​(Player currentPlayer)
      Player is unable to make a suggestion as they are not currently located in a room
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - current player

    • nobodyCouldRefute

      public int nobodyCouldRefute()
      Show options for current player if nobody could refute
      Returns:
      integer option

    • successfulRefutation

      public void successfulRefutation​(java.lang.String characterName)
      Other player has successfully refuted the current players suggestion
      Parameters:
      characterName - other player

    • failedRefutation

      public void failedRefutation​(java.lang.String characterName)
      Failed refutation
      Parameters:
      characterName - failed to make a refutation, ie. selecting a card that is not valid or passed
